title: Failed to concretize openfoam-org due to requirements in flex versions
body:
Spak failed to concretize `openfoam-org` due to requirements in flex versions.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack spec openfoam-org
Input spec
--------------------------------
openfoam-org

Concretized
--------------------------------
==> Error: An unsatisfiable version constraint has been detected for spec:

    flex@2.6.3%gcc@4.8.5+lex arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
        ^bison@3.0.4%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
            ^m4@1.4.18%gcc@4.8.5+sigsegv arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
                ^libsigsegv
        ^gettext@0.19.8.1%gcc@4.8.5+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
            ^bzip2
            ^libxml2
                ^pkgconfig
                ^xz
                ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@4.8.5+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 
            ^ncurses
            ^tar
        ^help2man@1.47.4%gcc@4.8.5 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64 


while trying to concretize the partial spec:

    scotch~int64~metis+mpi


scotch requires flex version :2.6.1,2.6.4:, but spec asked for 2.6.3
```

### Information on your system

I am using CentOS 7.4. I found the following specs in `scotch` package.

```
# Does not build with flex 2.6.[23]
depends_on('flex@:2.6.1,2.6.4:', type='build')
```
